Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and expectations. With its exceptional features and quality, it's truly worth more than its value to you. Considering its worth to both of us, I propose a special introductory price of $95 for you today. Don't miss out on this opportunity to experience the benefits of our product at an unbeatable rate. Let me know if you're interested! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $95. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $95
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
